document_data.name: ''Groonpeck's Field Guide to Terrifying Denizens of the Air, with special appendices for Acheron, the Elemental Planes, and the Abyss''
document_data.author: [[Groonpeck]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Groonpeck's Field Guide to Terrifying Denizens of the Air, with special appendices for Acheron, the Elemental Planes, and the Abyss''''' was an overlong-titled [[book]] from the [[Blade Kingdoms]], penned by scholar [[Groonpeck]] sometime long before [[1217 DR]].
document_data.Contents: ''Groonpeck's Field Guide'' was a voluminous tome that collected information on various dangerous avian creatures, including those found in various [[Elemental planes]] and the dreaded [[Abyss]]. Each entry in the book was accompanied by a well-drawn illustration of the beast, including such obscure creatures as [[firebird]]s—distant relatives of [[phoenix]]es.
document_data.History: In 1217 DR, [[Lorenzo Utrelli Da Lomarta]] and his love interest Princess [[Milianna Mannicci da Sumbria]] were able to identify a strange huge seemingly intelligent bird they befriended by accident. The huge bright orange-plumed beast named [[Tekorriikii]] was a firebird, a "sacred, untouchable, and extremely dangerous" beast to be avoided at all cost.
